description: The Toblino 2 exterior is made of luxurious bi-cast leather with a soft finish to provide ultimate protection for your iPad 2. The case also takes advantage of the iPad 2's sleep/wake function, waking it up when you open the case and putting it to sleep when you close it.  Inside, the gray plush microfiber interior keeps the iPad 2 screen free from scratches.  Additional padding protects against sharp impacts and punctures, without giving up the slim look of the iPad 2.  With a leather iPad 2 case like this, you can go where you like and do what you like - and look good doing it.
title: Toblino 2 black leather iPad 2 multi-angle stand case
